doc:
John Paul Getty III https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Paul_Getty_III 0 John Paul Getty III (; November 4/5, 1956 – February 5, 2011), was the grandson of American oil tycoon J. Paul Getty. While living in Rome in 1973, he was kidnapped for a $17 million ransom. His grandfather was reluctant to pay, as it could have put his other grandchildren in danger. After his severed ear was received by a newspaper, a deal was done, and Getty was released. He developed drug and alcohol addiction, eventually leading to a stroke that left him severely disabled for the rest of his life. John_Paul_Getty_III ( ; November_4/5_,_1956 – February_5_,_2011 ) , was the_grandson of American_oil_tycoon_J._Paul_Getty . While living in Rome in 1973 , he was_kidnapped for a_$_17_million_ransom . His_grandfather was reluctant to_pay , as it could_have_put his_other_grandchildren in danger . After his_severed_ear was_received by a_newspaper , a_deal was_done , and Getty was_released . He developed drug_and_alcohol_addiction , eventually_leading to a_stroke that left him severely_disabled for the_rest of his_life .
